q1.question: How much does it cost to register on Just-Tag?
q1.answer: We offer 3 plans (monthly, semi-annual, annual) with a launch rate starting at CHF 24.90/month for the first 100 registered restaurants. Standard rates apply thereafter. A lifetime offer at CHF 1,495 is also available. All semi-annual and annual plans include free personalized tote bags.

q2.question: Am I tied to a minimum duration?
q2.answer: No, the monthly plan has no commitment. You can cancel at any time. The semi-annual and annual plans are billed once for the chosen period.

q3.question: How is my restaurant featured?
q3.answer: Your restaurant appears in search results with a complete profile including photos, menu, opening hours and reviews. Depending on your plan, you benefit from priority display and a verified badge.

q4.question: Is the website available in multiple languages?
q4.answer: Yes, Just-Tag is available in French, German, English, Portuguese and Spanish. Your restaurant profile is translated into all five languages to reach as many customers as possible.

q5.question: What kind of support do you offer?
q5.answer: All plans include email support. Annual and Lifetime plans benefit from dedicated and priority support with a personal advisor.

q6.question: Can I update my profile at any time?
q6.answer: Absolutely. You can update your photos, menu, opening hours and all your information at any time from your dashboard.
